answers.author: Louise Snyder
answers.text:
Hi Jason,
Another source you might try is the ICMA Center for Performance Measurement (CPM).  We have an IT template, which includes a couple dozen IT measures developed with the help of IT experts around the country. CPM can assist with collection, cleaning, and reporting of your performance information. Please check out icma.org/performance to learn more.
